body.name: VNS Creations 40 Floral Blank Cards with Envelopes & Stickers - 4x6 Blank Cards Envelopes - All Occasion Greeting Cards - Bulk Boxed Set of Assorted Blank Note Cards - Cute Blank Stationary Notecards

features: WATERCOLOR NOTECARDS: Thank you card or personal note goes further for those occasions where you need to express your sympathy or gratitude to the people you appreciate. These bulk blank cards with envelopes are perfect for expressing your thoughts to friends, family, and colleagues

FLORAL AND GOLD FOIL ASSORTMENT: This box of assorted blank cards with envelopes contains 5 assorted and unique floral designs in sets of 8 cards each; Designs include lavender, rose and various styles of poppies; Each watercolor notecard includes an envelope and a matching sticker to seal it; All cards measure 4 x 6 inches; Keep our cute blank cards with envelopes on hand anytime you need to send a thoughtful handwritten note

PREMIUM QUALITY AND CHIC DESIGN: All cards are made from a thick and heavy-duty paper at a grade of 300 grams per square meter; Each floral blank note cards design embodies a simple and elegant mark of appreciation ideal for men and women for a variety of occasions

LARGE AND BLANK ON THE INSIDE: Each of the 4x6 blank note cards and envelopes are blank on the inside and leaves plenty of space for showing your sincere appreciation to those special people in your life; Each envelope is large enough to fit a standard sized photo; all cards come in a durable and reusable box for easy storage

HASSLE-FREE ENVELOPES AND DOUBLE ADHESION: All blank greeting cards with envelopes are lined on the inside and are moisture sealable (lick-to-seal); For an added layer of adhesion on the envelopes, we include matching peel-and-stick matching stickers to tie it all together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Note Cards!
reviews.reviewText: These note cards are the best value that I have found! First of all, they have lovely designs and secondly, the cardstock and envelopes are thick and sturdy. The icing on the cake are the precious coordinating stickers!I am so happy that I found these great note cards and will definitely shop with them in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great buy in times of high greeting card prices
reviews.reviewText: For those of us who don't want to spend $$ on greeting cards, which seems to be the norm these days (I saw one for $8 the other day), these are a wonderful and cost-effective option. They are pretty and the paper is easy to write on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just reordered these cards. The paper stock is heavy, the designs are beautiful and there are stickers to seal the envelopes. Wonderful for gifts and for your own use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I bought these blank notecards to use for sending personal thank you notes, get well wishes, and thinking of you messages. Not only are the designs beautiful, but they are printed on cardstock so they are nice and sturdy. They come with little stickers to seal your envelope, and I have already gotten compliments on the design from recipients.I plan to use a couple of these as art and will be putting them in little 4x6 frames because they are so cute they deserve to be displayed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, simple and tasteful. Well-rendered artwork with a gilded border. Surprisingly thick card stock and envelopes. I chose these for thank-you notes for funeral remembrances but they can be used for any occasion. Beyond my expectations and at a very good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful cards for a great price
reviews.reviewText: I love these beautiful cards! I ordered these so that I could start sending cards to my grandparents overseas regularly. The pack comes with 100 cards for only $25, so they come out to only 25 cents each. They are really sturdy, and I love that the outside of the cards, the inside of the envelopes, and the sealing stickers all match. The size is also perfect because they are good quality but are light enough to be able to be mailed overseas with just a global stamp. The only things I wish that were different were that the envelopes could be sealed without the need for the sticker (for extra protection in mail transit) and that the envelopes were sorted in the same order the cards are so that it's easier to match them. Those are minor complaints though. Overall, I love these cards and would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are very cute cards, especially for the price. I love that there is matching paper inside the envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality stationary
reviews.reviewText: The notes and envelopes are attractive and present as higher quality stationary. Both are of heavier material which is easy to write on without smearing

I was totally surprised with the quality of these cards. They could be used for any occasion . They come in a little box so it is easy to store them in a drawer or cupboard. I would highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very nice cards but did not see anywhere on listing that they needed folding for use as greeting cards to post.Bought as gift for elderly housebound lady who is.unable to do this!Easier to keep than returning to USA because return postage had to be paid since items not faulty., and customs declaration needed.
Very good quality cardstock. Nice images.

I go through a great many note cards and have bought many different brands. I think these are excellent value, especially with their heavy card stock and matching stickers. The only drawback if one would consider it such (I don't) is that the box they come in isn't sturdy enough to be a keepsake box. As I say, that doesn't matter to me, but it might be a negative for some people.
Nice and thick cards! Very pretty!
